state: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to head south. And then, take a trip east. And then, venture north. With that done, go east. Then, make an effort to move north. Then, go to the east. That done, head south. And then, make an effort to move south. And then, make an effort to go west. Then, head south. Next, try to go west. After that, venture west. With that accomplished, travel south. Then, retrieve the teaspoon from the floor of the kitchen. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Laundromat =- You've entered a laundromat. The room is well lit. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Laundromat =-0/1
